post_title: WTB-PSA 2s.  Now down to 60 or so.
post_content:
Inching closer to my all PSA 2 set.  I'm around 460 or so and have almost all of the biggies.  

If you have PSA 2s ONLY (no qualifiers, no half grades, no SGC, etc) from the list and are looking to sell them, please let me know what you have w/price. 

Please PM anything you may have and we can go to email if there's a deal to be had.  I did have my email address but I may have picked up a scammer with the cards they are sending from the list.   

Thanks in advance!!

and yes.  Within 10 minutes of posting I got 2 emails from "Mark" who got my email from google and isn't on net54.

He just said he isn't a scammer.....  go figure.
hey troy, i will check tonight  and send fb msg.
oh...and i am a scammer so beware!

found these so far

Abbott piedmont 350
Delehanty sov 150
Ferguson piedmont 350
O’leary sov 150
Rossman pied 350
Schaefer det  sov 150
Schreck piedmont 350

[quote name="trambo" post=2278839]and yes.  Within 10 minutes of posting I got 2 emails from "Mark" who got my email from google and isn't on net54.

He just said he isn't a scammer.....  go figure.[/QUOTE]



And yet, inevitably, someone on here will send Big Mark his rent money for that deal that’s too good to pass up.

updated 11/23 with what's still outstanding.

PSA 2s only w/no qualifiers.  I'm under 80 and hoping to close it out in the not too distant future.

Thanks for all who have assisted so far!!
PM'd regarding Tim Jordan and Wid Conroy

bump.  Up to 450 now so I'm getting close!  

Straight PSA 2s only with no qualifiers.  First post in the thread has the updated want list.  

Thanks for checking!

bump after about 6 weeks.  Down to 60.  Actively buying to get this done!

PM if you can help.  Only PSA 2s.

Current list in the top post.

Thanks!!
